channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Christmas tree dumped on grass verge behind Bournewood Road sign, 25th November
item.description:
Dumped Christmas tree needs removing from grass verge behind Bournewood Road Sign (to the left of Gilroy way) thx

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bournewood Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where indicated, 25th November
item.description:
I reported this pothole under ref 8396102. I was told it was not deemed serious enough for immediate action. I was surprised to hear this as it is quite a big pothole albeit in the middle of the road so I suppose more avoidable for drivers. I was told a decision would be made 14 days after my report but I have not heard anything. I do hope you will reconsider this pothole for repair Many thanks
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Park, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Food packaging, boxes, bags of rubbish, microwave oven?, 25th November
item.description:
All around the bins belonging to Papa John's Pizza which are in Pope St SE1 there is a large growing pile of food packaging, rubbish bags broken open and spilled onto the pavement. Cardboard boxes along the pavement and what looks like a microwave oven dumped on the pavement. This has been there for about two weeks and someone is adding to the pile. There is food amongst it as pigeons are picking through it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pope Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti sprayed on refuse containers at 340 bedwell house., 25th November
item.description:
I like to report graffiti sprayed on large steel rubbish containers at 340 Brixton road SW9. The containers are located outside Bedwell house residential flats. There are also more graffiti sprayed on more containers further down. The graffiti has been there for approximately over a week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): George Mews, Brixton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where indicated, 25th November
item.description:
I previously reported this pothole under ref 8396110. But was told it is duplicated and so it was closed. But this pothole still has not been re-inspected as requested So please could you ask the guys to have another look Much obliged Steve collins
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brondesbury Park, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 25th November
item.description:
A sofa and aerosol cans in black plastic bags were dumped in this location on Sunday evening, slightly blocking the footpath. The site is near a primary school.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King George Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Where indicated but not just here, 25th November
item.description:
There are a lot of leaves and litter too in this part of Christchurch Avenue. And I appreciate that it might be too general a request, but to be honest the whole of this stretch of Christchurch Avenue between Willesden lane and Brondesbury Park needs thorough sweeping on both sides of the road Sorry no time to take photos Many thanks; I really am grateful to you and the amazing guys doing the sweeping
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Willesden Lane, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
